title: Inspiration in 'Last Chance U: Basketball'
description:
Logan Murdock and Shea Serrano discuss the newest season of 'Last Chance U' and break down the emotional season of college basketball. They discuss their favorite characters, what it means to be a great coach, and the dramatic conclusion to the season.
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Shea Serrano
